query.statement:
UPDATE SAPHEE.ZQMT073 SET ADDGBN = #ADDGBN# ,SPEC12 = #SPEC12# ,SPEC3FR = #SPEC3FR# ,SPEC3TO = #SPEC3TO# ,SPEC5FR = #SPEC5FR# ,SPEC5TO = #SPEC5TO# ,ECSF = #ECSF# ,ETM = #ETM# ,MATKL = #MATKL# ,UDATE = HEX(CURRENT DATE) ,UTIME = HEX(CURRENT TIME) ,UUSER = #G_USER_ID# --조건추가(2016) ,AUSE = #AUSE# ,ACAPA = #ACAPA# ,AOPEN = #AOPEN# ,AFQFR = #AFQFR# ,AFQTO = #AFQTO# ,ASTQFR = #ASTQFR# ,ASTQTO = #ASTQTO# ,ADRV = #ADRV# ,ASPC = #ASPC# ,ACD1 = #ACD1# ,ACD2 = #ACD2# ,BFTHFR = #BFTHFR# ,BFTHTO = #BFTHTO# ,BWM = #BWM# ,BMOPB = #BMOPB# ,BCDM = #BCDM# ,BHR = #BHR# ,CJM1 = #CJM1# ,CJM1QFR = #CJM1QFR# ,CJM1QTO =#CJM1QTO# ,CJM1M = #CJM1M# ,CJM1FR = #CJM1FR# ,CHD1 = #CHD1# ,CHD1QFR = #CHD1QFR# ,CHD1QTO = #CHD1QTO# ,CHS1 = #CHS1# ,CHS1QFR = #CHS1QFR# ,CHS1QTO = #CHS1QTO# ,DEPH = #DEPH# ,DEPHTQFR = #DEPHTQFR# ,DEPHTQTO = #DEPHTQTO# ,EHOFR = #EHOFR# ,EHOTO = #EHOTO# ,EHTRHFR = #EHTRHFR# ,EHTRHTO = #EHTRHTO# ,EHPTO = #EHPTO# ,EHPFR = #EHPFR# ,EHHFR = #EHHFR# ,EHHTO = #EHHTO# ,EHVFR = #EHVFR# ,EHVTO = #EHVTO# ,EHM = #EHM# ,ECCAFR = #ECCAFR# ,ECCATO = #ECCATO# ,ECCBFR = #ECCBFR# ,ECCBTO = #ECCBTO# ,ECCHFR = #ECCHFR# ,ECCHTO= #ECCHTO# ,ECAAFR = #ECAAFR# ,ECAATO = #ECAATO# ,ECBBFR = #ECBBFR# ,ECBBTO = #ECBBTO# ,ECEEFR = #ECEEFR# ,ECEETO = #ECEETO# ,ETMM = #ETMM# ,ERPD = #ERPD# ,ERPW = #ERPW# ,ERPR = #ERPR# ,ECRL = #ECRL# ,ECGV = #ECGV# ,ECWRL = #ECWRL# ,ECWW = #ECWW# ,ECWSF= #ECWSF# ,DSV1 = #DSV1# ,DCCTV = #DCCTV# ,DCAIR = #DCAIR# ,ECJJFR = #ECJJFR# ,ECJJTO = #ECJJTO# ,ECHHFR = #ECHHFR# ,ECHHTO = #ECHHTO# ,ASTDA = #ASTDA# ,DUOPB = #DUOPB#
,AINOV = #AINOV# ,ASTD = #ASTD# ,DELD = #DELD# ,DSV2 = #DSV2# ,DHSBT = #DHSBT#
WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND DEPT = #DEPT# AND GJAHR = #GJAHR# AND ITEM = #ITEM# AND MATNR = #MATNR#
